alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 11:43AM AKST until December 30 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM FOR THE HAINES AND KLONDIKE HIGHWAYS THOUGH TONIGHT... .Snow and freezing rain will fall through this afternoon and this evening, with overrunning moisture into the cold Haines Valley and higher elevations of the Klondike Highway. Freezing rain for the southern Haines Highway expected through this evening, and snow for the remainder with higher snowfall rates this evening. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. Freezing rain is falling in the Haines area with accumulations up to 1/2 inch possible. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...We have received reports of 1/4 inch accumulation. Freezing rain will make travel very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
